declarations.description:
Interactive timeline widget for WebWriter applications. This web component creates an interactive timeline that allows users to: - Create and manage timeline events with dates and descriptions - Switch between timeline creation and quiz modes - Test knowledge with drag-and-drop quiz functionality - Customize panel visibility (timeline only, quiz only, or both) - Configure quiz feedback options The component consists of two main panels: 1. **Timeline Panel**: For creating and editing timeline events 2. **Quiz Panel**: For testing knowledge with interactive quiz features **Usage Examples:** ```html

Germany invades Poland, starting World War II.

 ```
declarations.name: WebWriterTimeline

cssProperties.description: Background color of the timeline area
cssProperties.name: --timeline-background

cssProperties.description: Background color of the quiz area
cssProperties.name: --quiz-background

members.name: tabIndex
members.description: Tab index for keyboard navigation accessibility.

members.name: _panelVisibility
members.description: Controls which panels are visible in the interface.

members.name: quizFeedbackOption
members.description:
Selected quiz feedback option (1-4).
Determines what feedback is shown after quiz completion:
- 1: Show correct answers only
- 2: Show score and correct answers
- 3: Show detailed explanations
- 4: Show progress tracking

members.name: dialog
members.description: Timeline dialog component for creating/editing events

members.name: quizToggle
members.description: Toggle switch for enabling/disabling quiz functionality

members.name: feedbackError
members.description: Error message container for quiz feedback validation

members.name: addToolTip
members.description: Tooltip for the add event button

members.name: tabGroup
members.description: Tab group container for switching between panels

members.name: eventManager
members.description: Event manager instance for handling timeline event operations

members.name: checkSelectedTab

parameters.name: selectedTab
parameters.description: The name of the selected tab ('quiz' or 'timeline')

members.description:
Handles tab selection changes between timeline and quiz panels.
Automatically starts quiz mode when quiz panel is selected and initializes 
the current panel state.

members.name: openingTLDialog
members.description:
Opens the timeline dialog for creating or editing events.
This method triggers the timeline dialog to become visible,
allowing users to add new events to the timeline.

members.name: startQuiz
members.description:
Initializes and starts the quiz with current timeline events.
Collects all child event elements and passes them to the quiz component
for creating quiz questions.

members.name: saveQuizSelection
members.description:
Saves the selected quiz feedback option and validates the selection.
Updates the quiz feedback display based on user selection and shows/hides
validation errors as appropriate.

events.description: Fired when a new event should be added to the timeline
events.name: request-add

events.description: Fired when an event should be removed from the timeline
events.name: request-remove

events.description: Fired when quiz feedback validation fails
events.name: show-quiz-feedback-error
